ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Suckage
ygData.msgSnippet: I went Linkdead about 2 hours after the GM spoke to me. She didn t tell me no to loot my corpse. I went and looted it an hour after talking to her (that s how
ygData.messageBody:
I went Linkdead about 2 hours after the GM spoke to me. She didn't tell me
no to loot my corpse. I went and looted it an hour after talking to her
(that's how long it took me just to get back to my corpse).
Actually, there is a way they can give you xp without rezzing you. They did
it for my mum once when she wasn't get xp for stuff. They determined that
there was a glitch and gave her xp.
luv,
-Su

>
> <<The worst part was, I lost my level.. and I still
> haven't gotten back after a week. I lost 3 blue
> bubbles of xp. :-( What do you folks think? Should I
> repetion?
> luv,
> -Su >>
>
> I doubt there's anything a GM can do now. Since
> you've probably looted your corpse completely, they
> can't rez you for experience. That really sucks that
> they didn't get back with you, though. How long were
> you online between talking to the GM and logging out?
> Because your petition gets removed from the queue when
> you log off your character ... if she was still
> looking into it, and you logged, there wouldn't have
> been anything left for her to do because you weren't
> online.
>
> ~Nymue~
>
> =====
> Nymue Ce'Nedra
> Wood Elf Druid, Cazic-Thule Server
